Uses of Class
engine.overlay.Overlay

Uses of Overlay in engine.overlay
 

Subclasses of Overlay in engine.overlay
 class OverlayBar
          The OverlayBar class displays a bar that grows or shrinks based on an int and a maximum indicated by the user This example creates an OverlayBar that displays the score of a game (as represented by myStat).
 class OverlayIcon
          This Overlay class displays a finite number of icons, with the image provided by the user
 class OverlayStat
          The Overlay stat class to display a String and something the user defines
 class OverlayStatImage
          The OverlayStatImage class displays a GreenfootImage defined by the user
 class OverlayString
          This OverlayString class displays some text on the screen.
 

Methods in engine.overlay that return types with arguments of type Overlay
 java.util.Collection<Overlay> OverlayManager.getOverlays()
          Returns all the Overlays in the OverlayManager.
 

Methods in engine.overlay with parameters of type Overlay
 void OverlayPanel.addOverlay(Overlay overlay)
          Adds an overlay to the panel.
 void OverlayManager.addOverlay(Overlay overlay, int x, int y)
          Add the given Overlay to OverlayManager's group.
